div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxjo die
mensis februarij Anno quo supra et cetera

The said day comperit patry chirnsid befor the bailyes and allegit that
he protestit befor ane suorne assis' to Alexander prat alsmekle' money
for xlj pund of hemp and ane half as he bocht it for in flandris And'
he allegit that he l prewit befor the said assis' that he bocht the said hemp
to him self and nocht to Alexander prat And' gif he preuit it nocht
that tyme Sufficiently befor the said' assis' he sale preiwe his saide
allegeance yet befor ony Juge competent

vicesimo sexto die mensis februarij anno quo supra patricius Austrij fecit constituit creauit
et nominauit Robertum Waus suum legittimum procuratorem actorem factorem dans et concedens eisdem suam
liberam presentatem ac mandatum speciale pro se et nomine suo ad petendum exigendum et recipiendum
a Waltero Allansone decim s' et Inde quietclamandum Et si necesse fuerit prosequendum Ac
agendum defendendum et promittens de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij cum
ceteris clausulis necessariis et oportunis

The saide day Johnne Scot in Inuerugy and Dauid Kynnarde oblist thame be the
fathtis of thar bodiis coniunctlie and Seueralie Renuncand' the benefice of Davisone' tile tho
mas Waus ane of the balyeis of Abirdene in fyf Stane and hald ane stane
of woll merchande gude to be pait within the said' burghe at beltane nixte
hereftir for sere Dauy georgis carne quhyn' Ande the saide sere Dauy george oblist him be
fatht of his bodie to freithe and releiwe the saidez Johnne and Dauy anent the pament
of the said' woll In presence of thomas leslie balye Androw fyf and Williame
Kyntor

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vltimo die mensis februarij
anno quo supra

The saide day Jonhne arthour' grantit that he hede resauit fra Katerine
Cullane ane procurator vndir the Sele of Johne Retre ane confirmacion'
of the office of executory vndir my lorde of Abirdene Sele ane emissiwe
lettir to wair' the money and he get it Ande ane emissiue lettre within
with copin' gravis hande of the gudis pertening to vmquhile Johne Dun
cansone Ande he deliuerit the saide lettres to Robert moyses except the said'
with subscriuit with Copin gravis hande quhilk he hed deliuerit to the
saide copin and maide cownt and rekning with him Ande he Resauit
nay money

The saide day the borghe' fundin one hu Walter allansone be
Robert Waus procurator for patry austyne for the wranguis' haldin
fra him of x s' was fundin avale for the quhilk the said Walter
was in ane Amerciament of the court et cetera Ande the balyeis chargit
the saide Walter to pay the saide x s' within terme of law

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
tercio die mensis marcij anno quo supra

The saide day Scottis thome pynor was conuict' for trubulance of
tiby blinsele be ane Suorne assis' Dauy blinsele forspekar Ande
the saide Tiby conuict for tribulance of the saide thomas et cetera for
the quhilkis it was ordanit be the assis' gif ony of the saide
personis trubulis vthiris and beis conuict tharof in tyme to Cum sal pay
xx s' vnforgevin to Sanct nicholes werk the saide partiis being
oblist obefor be the fathtis of thar bodiis to stande at the ordinance
of the saide assis' In the premiss'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem quarto die mensis
marcij anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman ballieis Counsale and Communite of Abirdene oppinlie
warnit be premunicioun' of the commone hande bele and belmane ande the four'
sergeandis throw the haill toune gathtreit ande Circualy Inquerit be Williame
scrimgeor officiar' with ane Consent and assent grantit ande gaf to mastir
thomas chamer thar perpetuale chaplanry of our lady altar' fundat' within
thar parroche kirk for ale the dais of his lyve vacant be deces' of vmquhile
mastir Alexander fyf possessor of the samyn with ale landis annuele Rentis
obuentis proventis Offerandis Commoditeis asiamentis and profitis pertening or may
pertene tharto Ande at thar commavnde Johne leslie of warderis aldirman gaf the
saide chaplanry to the saide mastir thomas be ane Ryng et cetera the saide
mastir thomas doing dyvine suffiage and seruice tharfor according to the tenor
of the fundacioun Ande thai ordanit thar common clerk to mak ane autentyve
writin of thar' saide donacioun vndir thar commone Seile herapoun' Ande the
keparis of the saide Seile to Seyle thar saide donacioun Ande thar saide aldirman
to pas' and Institut the saide mastir thoma in the saide chapellanry in thar'
names

The saide day It was Statut ande ordanit be the aldirman ballieis consale
ande communite of the saide burghe' that ale personis hawande corne grovande
within the freidome of the samyn sale bring the saide cornez' to the common myllis
of the saide burghe' and tile nayne vthir myllis Ande gif ony persone falyeis thar
in sale pay the haill mvltar of thar' corne to the takismene of thar' myllis
and Ilkane ane Amerciament of the court to the balyeis for the brekin of commone
ordinance quhilkis Statut accordis and Is consonant to our Souerane lordis
lawis

The saide day the aldirmane and ballieis assignit firday the vij day of marche
Instant to sere Johne ruthirfurde knicht tile Ansuer' to Copin hill anent
the occupeing of ane croft eftir the tenor of our Souerane lordis lettres
direct to thame tharupoun'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vijo
die mensis marcij Anno quo supra et cetera

The said day comperit copin hill witht Johne of mar his forspekar and'
allegiit proponit and schew that sere Johne ruthirfurd' knicht wranguisly
hed' occupeit manurit and laborit ane croft pertenyng to him in here
tage beseking the aldirman and bailyes of ministracioun' of Justice to be done
to him eftir the tenour' of our Souerane lordis lettres direct to thame
tharupone The said knicht lauchfully warnit comperit denyit the
wranguis' occupacioun' of the said croft without tak or assedacione of him Offering him to vnderly
the decissioun' of ane assis' tharuppoun' And' Incontinent thareftir the said'
actioun' witht consent of baitht the said partiis was put to the
decissioun' of ane assis' ofe' thir personis vnder writin that is to say
Johnne cullane Alexander red' Androue cullan James collisoun' Dauid
mar Androue murray Robert crag mathow branch patry chirnsid' ga
wane murray William colp patry leslie yongar Richerd Waus yongar
Alexander mathesone Williame Kintor thome Watsone and Johne
moir quhilkis as thane auisit declarit thai coud' nocht as that tym'
deliuer' in the said' matir

The saide day patry arthour' was in ane amerciament of the court be his avne toung
for the forstalling of the burghe in bying of Stanis

The saide day William Watsone was in Amerciamentis of the court for forstalling'
of the burghe' be his avne toung gravnt Inbring of hidis et cetera and skinnis

The saide day Johne Crak comperit for the forstalling of the said burghe
and promittit to pay Ane franche Crovne

Reuerendo In cristo patri ac domino thome dei et apostolis sedis gracia Episcopo Aberdonensis
seu eius vna In spirutualibus Prepositus consules et communitas burgj de Aberdene seipsos
cum honore et reuerencia ad capellaniam perpetuam altaris sanctj michaelis infra
ecclesiam nostram perrochialem situatem venerabilem virum magistrum Johan
nem clat Abirdonensis et Brechensis ecclesiarum canonicum aliis fundatam de
Jure et de facto vacanti obitum domini Johannis Seres vlnis possessoris eiusdem ad
nostram presentacionem pleno Jure spectantem prouidem virum dominum henricum hervy capel
lanum presencium latorem veste paternitatis duximus presentandum eandum vestram paternitatem
Regans quatenus prefatum dominum henricum presentatum In et ad realem eandem actualem et corporalem
possessionem dicte capellanie et pertinenciarum eiusdem admittere dignetur diem
caritatis introitu dictam quia capellanis cum pertinenciis eidemque conferre Contradictores et rebelles
si qui forsan fueruit per censuram ecclesiasticam orenis datis sub sigillo nostro
communi Apud burgum nostrum de Abirdene vicesima prima die mensis Decembris Anno
domini millesimo quadringentesimo sexagesimo Septimo

The said' day Androue stevinsone offerit him reddy tile answeir'
to the borgh' fundin one him be Alexander prat becaus the said
Alexander prat comperit nocht he protestit for his costis and skaithtis
And that he ansuer nocht vnto the tyme he be new warnit

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo
die mensis marcij Anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo quarto et cetera

Reuerendo in christo patri et domino domini thome dei apostolis sedis gracia Episcopo Abirdonensis
vestri et deuoti prepositus consules et communitas burgj de abirdene reuerencias de
bitas et honores cum filiali obediencia ad altare sancte michaelis infra ecclesia
perrochialiem de Abirdene situatum nunc vacans per mortem dominj robertj roule
vltimum possessoris eiusdem ad nostram presentacionem vestramque collacionem pleno
Jure spectans discretum virum dominum henricum hervy vestre diocesis prescribiturum eidem vestre
reuerende paternitatj presencium tenore presentamus Eandem vestram presentem legittimum littere
Regiam quatenus prefatum dominum henricum presentatum nostrum vel eius sufficiente procu
ratorem In et ad realem actualem et corporalem possessione capellanis dicti altaris
Sanctj michaelis et pertinenciarum eiusdem admittere sibique per annuli vestri
tradicionem diuine caritatis Intuitu conferre ac Ipsum vel eius procuratorem

Institutione in eadem seu instrumentum mandare ac alia sibi facere dignemini de gracj
Speciali que vobis ex officio patorali de super incumbunt peragenda dictum sub
Sigillo nostro communj Apud Abirdene penultimo die mensis octobris Anno
Dominj millesimo quadringentesimo septuagesimo primo Judicacione quinta
pontificatus sanctissimj in cristo patris et dominj nostri domini sextj pape quartj Anno
primo et cetera

The saide day thome steile tuk one him to bring Johne buk or ellis
alsmeile of his gudis one friday that nixt cumis befor the ballies
as William blinsele clamys aving him be the saide Androw that Justice
mycht be ministirit to the saide William and the arrest maide one the saide
thomas gudis be lousit according to Justice

The saide day Robert murray lauchfullie callit wardit and nocht comperit tile
ansuer' tile Alexander hay his nychtbur' for haldin of his dikis vnbiggit
and for the costis skathtis and dampnis Sustenit he him tharthrow tharfor the
balyeis ordanit officiar to pas' and distrenye the saide Robert
for his Amerciament

The saide day sere Jonhne ruthirfurde knicht follouit be copin hill for the
wranguis' occupacioun manuring and laboring of ane croft pertening to him
in heretage without tak or assedacioun' of him be verteue of the kingis lettres
directit to the aldirman and ballieis tharupone denyit the wranguis' occupe
yng and labouring of the saide croft / as in the act of this Court buk
maid' the vij day of this Instant monetht of merche is contenit
quhilkis actioun' with consent and assent of batht the said' partiis was put
to the decisioun' of ane assis' of thir personis contenit in the said act that
Is to say Jonhne of Cullane Alexander Rede Androw Cullane James Colisone
Dauy mar' Androw murray Robert Crag / mathow branche patry leslie gavan'
of murray Williame Colp patry chernsid' Richerd Waus yongar alexander matho
sone William Kintor thome Watsone and Johne mar' burges of the saide burghe
quhilkis riplie avisit the gretis aithe Suorne deliuerit and furthtgaf that
the saide sere Johne ruthirfurd' hed' done nay wrang as yeit in the labouring
and manvring of the saide Croft

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xvijo die mensis
marcij anno quo supra

The saide day Dauy Kintor lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht comperit tile
entir thomas Dunbrek as he that come Souerte for his entres' the saide day
tile heir' Williame Watsone preiwe that the saide thomas Intromettit with ane
quhit meyr' of his for the quhlkis the saide Dauy was in ane Amerciament of the
court et cetera

The saide day Dauy scot duellande in Dunbrek lauchfullie summond' be ane precep
of the sereffis deponit be his aithe that thome Dunbrek in Cortecrome Intromettit
with ane quhit mayr' of William Watsonis burges of the saide burghe

Robert Jofray in taruas lauchfullie summond' and Suorne concordis with the saide Dauy
scotti deposicioun in ale thingis

The saide day Johne fechat grantit to freithe and Relewe Johne loremar' of xij s'
and tua d' at the handis of Johne of murray gude Sone to William of murray within
terme of law

The saide day gilbert prestone officiar' be his wande of office chargit and orda
nit at commavnde of the ballieis mathowe branche to abide and Remane within
the tolbutht vnto the tyme he schew the balyeis his gudis strenyeabile for
the pament of the Some of xxvj li' and xvj s' contenit in our' Souerane lordis lettres
direct tharupone aving to george eduardsone for certane Salt and to the Releving
of gilbert menyeis tharanent becaus' the said' mathowe grantit that he hed' xl pundis
worthtis of gudis within the saide burghe'

The saide day gilbert prestone officiar' be his wande of office chargit and
chargit ordanit at commavnde of the ballieis Dauy mar' Sone and ayr to
vmquhile thomas mar' to Remane within the tolbutht vnto the tyme he
schewe to the ballieis his gudis or lande strenyeabile for his part of the
pament of xxvj li' and xvj s' aving to george eduardsone et cetera

Eodem die Willelmum blakhale de eodem fecit constituit creauit nominauit et
ordinauit Robertum blinseill Alexandrum red' Alexandrum skene de eodem
patricium Red et Isabellam hay sponsam suam suos legittimos procuratores
coniunctim et diuisim in omnibus actionibus ipsum concernens agendum defendendum
dominj prott Promittens de Rato et grato et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
vicesimo Octauo die mensis marcij Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo
quinto et cetera

The said day the b thomas Waus and Dauid steuart tua of
the bailyes of Abirdene assignit monunday the last of this Instant
monetht of marche to Johnne of mar one that ane part ande
Johnne' meldrum one that vthir part to compeir befor thame for ministra
cioun' of Justice equaly to be done to thame eftir the tenour of oure
Souerane lordis lettres direct to tham tharupoun' tueching the
malis of ane land liand within the said burgh' as in the samyn
mair fullely Is contenit

head.add: Abbat de bonacord' et Dauid treis

div.p:
The said day Dauid treis was in ane amerciament of the court be
his awin toung grantit for strubulance of Johnne of mar'
abbot of bonacord and his conuent to the novmer of xxiiij personis

The said day Jolemay munk was conuict' be ane suorne assis'
Johne mar' for spekar for the strubulance of canne bard for
the quhilkis scho was in amerciament of the court And sche
ordanit to pay v s' to the said Agnes for ane mendis Ande give euire
scho struibulite hir or ony vtheris in tyme to cum sale pay xxtj s' to sanct
nicholes' werk vnforgevin

The saide day In presence of thomas leslie ane of the ballieis margaret
of buchan oblist hir be the fatht of hir bodie to pay to Williame
scrimgeour xiij s' and iiijor d' scottis monay within ane yer' hereftir for the
quhilkis scho hede part of weddis liand' with him in tyme of the making'
of this Actis

Curia Capitalis balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio bur
gi de Aberdene' vltimo die mensis marcij Anno Domini millesimo
Quingentesimo quinto Quo die sectis vocatis et curia affir
mata absentes patent in Rotulo Sectis

head.add: Inquisicion dompnj Robertj Kervour cannonicj de skena

div.p:
Inquisicio facta apud burgum de abirdene vltimo die mensis marcij Anno Domini millesimo
quingentesimo quinto Coram honorabilis viris Johanne lesly de Warderis preposito thoma
lesly thoma Waus Dauid steuart et patricio lesly balliuis dictj burgj in pretorio
burgj eiusdem in curia capitalj protribunali sedens per subscriptem videlicet dominum Johannem
Ruthirfurd' militem Dauid menyheis Alexander menyeis reid' Johannem cullan gilbertum
menyeis Alexandrum gray Jacobum collisone andream fyff Richardum Waus Dauid mar'
Willelmum Wormet Johannem blak patricium Reid' Dauid murray malcomum crag Willelmum
Kintor henricum reid' Robertum hay patricium chernsid' Johannem auchneyve Dauid
Adamsone bugensem dictj burgj Quj Jurati dicunt quod quondam dominus Andreas gray
capellanus auunculus dompnj Robertj Kervour canonicj latoris presencium obijt vltimo
vestitus et Sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostrj regis de quadam terra
anteriore iacente infra dictum burgum in vico le gastraw ex occidentali parte eiusdem vicj
inter terram quondam Dauid spens ex australi et terram quondam thome cullan ex
boreali partibus ab altera et communionem viam versus oriens Et terram Inter
iorem alexandrj Ranysone versus occidens Et quod dictus dompnus Robertus
est legittimis et propinquior heres dictj quondam domini Andree auunculj suj de dicta terra cum
pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra valet nunc per annum xiij s'
iiij d' Et valuit x s' tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de Suppremo domino
nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit in manibus domini nostrj Regis
legittime et per seipsum ob decessum dictj quondam domini Andree per spcaium trium
mensium aut eocirca in defectu verj heredis Jus suum huiusque minime prosequentis

Iidem Jurati dicunt quod quondam gilbertus Riburne frater margarete Riburne latricis
presencium obijt vltimo vestitus et Sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri
Regis de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico nauium ex orientalj
parte eiusdem vicj inter terram Johannis chamer ex australi ex vna et terram quondam
Andree lammyntone ex boreali partibus ab altera et terram quondam Jacobi Kintor ex orientali
et communionem viam regiam ex occidentalij Et quod dicta margareta est vna de legittimis
et propinquioribus heredibus dictj quondam gilbertj fratris sui Et quod est legittime etatis
Et quod valet nunc per annum quadraginta denarios Et valuit vigintj denarios tempore
pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgi

Eodem die omnes burgenses rure manetes amerciantur in defectu presencie exceptis androw mechelsone'
Dauid lame Alexandro andersone et thome lesk presentibus
Et nunc existit in manibus domini nostrj Regis ob decessum dictj quondam
gilberti fratris suj per spacium sex mensium aut eocirca in defectu verj heredes Jus suum
huiuscumque minime prosequentis Datum et clausum sub Sigillo

Eodem die accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Johannes Arnot minster domus
sancte trinitatis de abirdene et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu xl
denariorum monete scocie sibi et dicti domuj ac conuentui eisdem annuatim debito de quadam terra penitus
vasta iacente infra in le futy inter terram quondam Alexandrj Westland ex
australi ex vna et terram quondam Willelmum menyeis ex boreali et communionem viam regiam ex
occidentali extendens in longitudine a maris fluxum sue Arenas versus oriens
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam 3o die huius processus Testibus

Eodem die accedens ad barram religiosus vir frater Johannes Arnot minister domus sancte trinitatis
de Abirdene et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditus quinque s' monete
scocie sibi et dicto loco annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluto de quadam terra
vasta Jacente ex occidentali parte vicj nauium ex boreali parte eiusdem inter terram
quondam domino thome hervy capellanj ex orientali et communionem viam regiam ex occidentali
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Johannes malisone capellanus
et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu octo s' de quadam terra
penitus vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex orientali parte eiusdem
vicj inter terram Rectorum de Oyne ex australi ex vna et terram heredum quondam
Robertj cullan ex boreali partibus ab altera et communiones vias regias versus oriens
ex occidens Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram
et lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam 3o die huius
processus Testibus Roberto Walcar Alexandr angousone et ormundo lesly seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Andreas chavmere capellanus altaris
sancti cristoforj infra ecclesiam parrochialem sanctj nicholaij de abirdene situati Et protestabatur in forma
Juris pro vno annuo redditu v s' sibi et dicto altarj annuatim debito et non soluto de quadam
terra vasta Jacente ex occidentali parte vicj nauium ex boreali parte eiusdem inter terram quondam domini
thome hervy ex orientali ex vna et communionem viam regiam ex occidentali partibus ab
altera Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram
et lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo presentuit in curia tanquam secundo die huius
processus Testibus Andrea low Andrea Watsone et gilberto prestone sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Johannes reid capellanus ac procu
rator altaris sanctj Jacobi apostoli infra ecclesiam sanctj nicholaij de Abirdene situati et
protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu quadraginta denariorum sibi
et dicto altarj annuatim debitum et a longo tempore non soluto de quadam terra
vasta quondam henricj Rany in futy inter terram quondam WillelmjRany ex australi
ex vna et terram quondam Willelmum Westland ex boreali partibus ab altera Ad quam
terram Accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides Quos
balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus
Symon Ellone cristinus Symmer et Andrea nachtj sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Andreas collisone capellanus
ac procurator altaris sanctj michaelis Archangeli infra ecclesiam perrochialem
beati nicholaij de Abirdene situati et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuj
Redditu octo solidorum vsualis monete scocie sibi et dicto altarj annuatim debito et a
longo tempore non soluto de quadam terra vasta quondam Willelmum nory iacente
in vico superiore ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem inter terram quondam ipsius Willelmum
Nory ex occidentali ex vna et torrentem communionem discendens ad molendinum superius
versus oriens et communionem viam regiam vesus boream Ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo
presentauit in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus thoma gled
stan' et Johanne paule textor ac Normando lesly seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir magister thomas chavmer
capellanus ac procurator altaris sanctj marie virginis infra ecclesiam parrochialem
sanctj nicholaij de Aberdene et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno
annuo Redditu quinque solidorum vsualis monete scocie sibi et dicto altarj annuatim
debito et a longo tempore non soluto de quadam terra vasta quondam Willelmi norj Jacente infra
dictum burgum in vico superiori ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem vicj inter
terram ipsius quondam Willelmi ex occidentali ex vna et torrentem sine aque
ductum ad molendinum superius discendens versus oriens et communiem viam
regiam versus boream Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in curia
tanquam secundo die huius processus testibus thoma gledstane Johanne paule
textore et Ormundo lesly sergeando
